front.title: IEEE Standard for the Electrical Protection of Communication Facilities Serving Electric Supply Locations Through the Use of Hybrid Facilities
front.abstract: Safe and reliable methods for the electrical protection of telecommunication facilities serving electric supply locations through the use of metallic wire-line components in part of thetelecommunication circuit and optical fiber systems in the remainder of the telecommunicationcircuit are presented in this standard. Hybrid applications have an equipment junction betweenthe metallic wire-line and the fiber cable, i.e., a wire-linefiber cable junction (CFJ).
